title: The One Where Old Yeller Dies

questions.question: What is Phoebe watching at the beginning of the episode with Monica, Rachel, Ross, and Richard?
questions.correct_answer: Old Yeller
questions.explanation: Phoebe enters to see Monica, Richard, Ross, and Rachel tearfully watching Old Yeller.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe think Old Yeller is a happy movie?
options: Because Yeller saves the family from the wolf
questions.correct_answer: Because Yeller saves the family from the wolf
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'C'mon, happy family gets a dog, frontier fun.' and thinks Yeller saves the family from the wolf.

questions.question: What is wrong with the friend Eric Prower that Chandler and Joey are considering bringing to the Knicks game?
questions.correct_answer: He has bad breath
questions.explanation: Chandler says Eric Prower 'has breath issues'.

questions.question: Why does Ross want to spend more time with Ben?
options: Because he wants to teach Ben how to play basketball
Because he wants to take Ben to the zoo
Because he misses important milestones in Ben's life
Because he wants to go on vacation with Ben
questions.correct_answer: Because he misses important milestones in Ben's life
questions.explanation: Ross says 'I'm so sick of missing stuff. Ya know, I want him for more than, than a day, I want him for a whole weekend.'

questions.question: What is the name of the book that Ross read which made him think of the name Emily for a future child?
options: The Big Book of Children's Names
What to Expect When You're Expecting
questions.correct_answer: The Big Book of Children's Names
questions.explanation: Ross says 'I read a book and there was a girl named Emily and I thought, I thought that might be good. The big book of children's names.'

questions.question: Why does Rachel get upset with Ross?
options: Because he wants to break up with her
Because he doesn't want to have children
Because he has planned out their entire future together without consulting her
Because he wants to move to Scarsdale
questions.correct_answer: Because he has planned out their entire future together without consulting her
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'You have planned out the next 20 years of our lives, we've been dating for six weeks.'

questions.question: What movie does Phoebe watch after talking to her grandma about Old Yeller?
questions.correct_answer: It's a Wonderful Life
questions.explanation: Monica says 'Ok, here, watch this. It's a Wonderful Life. Yes I've heard of this.'

questions.question: What does Joey try to do to look like Richard?
questions.correct_answer: Smoke a cigar
questions.explanation: Joey is seen with a cigar in his mouth, looking at his reflection in a spatula.

questions.question: Why does Monica get upset with Richard?
options: Because he doesn't want to spend time with her
Because he wants to break up with her
Because he is spending too much time with Chandler and Joey
Because he doesn't like her friends
questions.correct_answer: Because he is spending too much time with Chandler and Joey
questions.explanation: Monica says 'So are you ok? I feel like I'm about a hundred. I thought I was just one of the guys.'

questions.question: What game are Chandler and Joey playing with Richard?
questions.correct_answer: Foosball
questions.explanation: Chandler and Joey are playing foosball with Richard at Chandler and Joey's apartment.

questions.question: What is Ben's first word?
questions.correct_answer: Hi
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'Ben just said his first word... Hi.'

questions.question: What does Phoebe watch at the end of the episode with Ben?
questions.correct_answer: Bert and Ernie
questions.explanation: Phoebe is watching Bert and Ernie with Ben at Monica and Rachel's apartment.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe's mom not show her the ends of sad movies?
options: Because she doesn't want Phoebe to be sad
Because she wants Phoebe to think the movies have happy endings
Because she wants to shield Phoebe from the pain and sadness
Because she doesn't think Phoebe can handle it
questions.correct_answer: Because she wants to shield Phoebe from the pain and sadness
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'my mom used to not show us the ends of sad movies to shield us from the pain and sadness.'

questions.question: What is the name of the disease that Lou Gehrig had?
questions.correct_answer: Lou Gehrig's disease
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'Pride of the Yankees, I thought I was gonna see a film about Yankee pride and then, boom, the guy gets Lou Gehrig's disease.'

questions.question: What does Chandler say about Richard's age?
options: He's older than some people but younger than some buildings
questions.correct_answer: He's older than some people but younger than some buildings
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'he's, ya know, older than some people, but, uh, younger than some buildings.'

questions.question: What does Joey say about Richard?
questions.correct_answer: He's really cool
questions.explanation: Joey says 'your boyfriend is so cool'.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about the movie 'It's a Wonderful Life'?
options: It's a sucky life and just when you think it can't suck any more it does
questions.correct_answer: It's a sucky life and just when you think it can't suck any more it does
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'It's a sucky life and just when you think it can't suck any more it does.'

questions.question: Why does Ross want to have two babies?
options: Because he wants a boy and a girl
Because he wants to have twins
Because he wants to have two boys
Because he wants to have two girls
questions.correct_answer: Because he wants a boy and a girl
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Ya know, a boy and a girl. Hopefully the girl will come first so Ben here won't feel too competitive.'

questions.question: What does Rachel say about Ross's plans for their future?
options: She doesn't want to have everything decided for her
questions.correct_answer: She doesn't want to have everything decided for her
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'I do not want to have everything decided for me.'

questions.question: What does Ross say about his future with Rachel?
options: He doesn't want to be with her
He wants to be with her but doesn't know what the future holds
He knows they will end up together
He wants to break up with her
questions.correct_answer: He knows they will end up together
questions.explanation: Ross says 'I know that we're gonna end up together and if that scares you, tough, 'cause you're gonna have to deal with that.'

questions.question: What is the first word that Ben says to Ross?
questions.correct_answer: Bye
questions.explanation: Ben says 'Bye' to Ross when Ross is dropping him off.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about her mom's method of shielding her from sad movies?
options: She would turn off the TV before the sad part
She would fast forward through the sad part
She would cover Phoebe's eyes during the sad part
She would not show Phoebe the ends of sad movies
questions.correct_answer: She would not show Phoebe the ends of sad movies
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'my mom used to not show us the ends of sad movies to shield us from the pain and sadness.'

questions.question: Why does Monica get upset with Chandler and Joey?
options: Because they are spending too much time with Richard
Because they are not spending enough time with Richard
Because they are being mean to Richard
Because they are being mean to her
questions.correct_answer: Because they are spending too much time with Richard
questions.explanation: Monica says 'So are you ok? I feel like I'm about a hundred. I thought I was just one of the guys.'

questions.question: What does Richard say about his age?
options: He doesn't think about his age
questions.correct_answer: He feels old
questions.explanation: Richard says 'I feel like I'm about a hundred.'

questions.question: What does Phoebe watch with Ben at the end of the episode?
questions.correct_answer: Bert and Ernie
questions.explanation: Phoebe is watching Bert and Ernie with Ben at Monica and Rachel's apartment.

questions.question: Why does Ross want to spend more time with Ben?
options: Because he wants to teach Ben how to play basketball
Because he wants to take Ben to the zoo
Because he misses important milestones in Ben's life
Because he wants to go on vacation with Ben
questions.correct_answer: Because he misses important milestones in Ben's life
questions.explanation: Ross says 'I'm so sick of missing stuff. Ya know, I want him for more than, than a day, I want him for a whole weekend.'

options: He's older than some people but younger than some buildings
questions.correct_answer: He's older than some people but younger than some buildings
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'he's, ya know, older than some people, but, uh, younger than some buildings.'

questions.correct_answer: He's really cool
questions.explanation: Joey says 'your boyfriend is so cool'.

options: It's a sucky life and just when you think it can't suck any more it does
questions.correct_answer: It's a sucky life and just when you think it can't suck any more it does
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'It's a sucky life and just when you think it can't suck any more it does.'

options: Because he wants a boy and a girl
Because he wants to have twins
Because he wants to have two boys
Because he wants to have two girls
questions.correct_answer: Because he wants a boy and a girl
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Ya know, a boy and a girl. Hopefully the girl will come first so Ben here won't feel too competitive.'

questions.question: What does Rachel say about Ross's plans for their future?
options: She doesn't want to have everything decided for her
questions.correct_answer: She doesn't want to have everything decided for her
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'I do not want to have everything decided for me.'

questions.question: What does Ross say about his future with Rachel?
options: He doesn't want to be with her
He wants to be with her but doesn't know what the future holds
He knows they will end up together
He wants to break up with her
questions.correct_answer: He knows they will end up together
questions.explanation: Ross says 'I know that we're gonna end up together and if that scares you, tough, 'cause you're gonna have to deal with that.'

questions.question: What is the first word that Ben says to Ross?
questions.correct_answer: Bye
questions.explanation: Ben says 'Bye' to Ross when Ross is dropping him off.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe say that her mom used to shield her from sad movies?
options: Because she wanted Phoebe to be happy
Because she wanted to protect Phoebe from the pain and sadness
Because she didn't want Phoebe to watch sad movies
Because she wanted Phoebe to watch only happy movies
questions.correct_answer: Because she wanted to protect Phoebe from the pain and sadness
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'my mom used to not show us the ends of sad movies to shield us from the pain and sadness.'
